ActPayments in Lieu of Taxes Act
PrecisAppointment of MARIAN TYSON, Q.C., of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a member of the Payments in Lieu of Taxes Dispute Advisory Panel to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years.
